metadata.title: CVE-2019-0222 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
In Apache ActiveMQ 5.0.0 - 5.15.8, unmarshalling corrupt MQTT frame canlead to broker Out of Memory exception making it unresponsive.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-0222` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmqtt-client-java - 1.10-1ubuntu0.1~esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: activemq package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
mqtt-client package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.10-1ubuntu0.1~esm1').
